simulate_tracking¶

Functions for simulating the tracking of an object in space.

simulate_tracking.get_angles(passes, o, radar, dt=0.1)[source]¶
simulate_tracking.get_passes(o, radar, t0, t1, max_dpos=100.0, debug=False, verbose=False, logger=None)[source]¶
simulate_tracking.get_scan_snr(t, o, radar)[source]¶
simulate_tracking.get_track_snr(t, o, radar)[source]¶
simulate_tracking.plot_angles(ts, angs)[source]¶
simulate_tracking.plot_snr(t, all_snrs, radar)[source]¶
simulate_tracking.print_passes(det_times)[source]¶

Function to pretty print detection times list returned by the simulate_tracking.get_passes() function.

Parameters:det_times (list) – List of dictionaries generated by get_passes.
